inputs.remark:
V1: Speech audiometry correction: split “SRT 38 dB HL AU” to Right 38 dB, Left 35 dB.
Ordered list: Add acoustic reflexes.
Visits: V2 missing daughter‑accompanied counseling session (additional history, vision/dexterity assessment, and hearing aid option evaluation).

logic_summary: Corrected V1 Speech audiometry SRT values to Right 38 dB, Left 35 dB based on the audiogram.
Added Acoustic reflexes to the ordered list of investigations.
Inserted the missing daughter-accompanied counseling session as V2 and re-indexed the subsequent fitting visit to V3.

patch_ops.value: SRT Right 38 dB, Left 35 dB; Word Recognition Scores excellent (96%) bilaterally at elevated levels.

value.rationale_short: To evaluate the acoustic reflex pathways.

value.collective_interpretation: Daughter-accompanied counseling session involving additional history, vision/dexterity assessment, and hearing aid option evaluation.

tests.name: Vision and Dexterity Assessment
tests.result_summary: Identified limited vision and manual dexterity.

tests.name: Hearing Aid Selection
tests.result_summary: Recommended full-shell custom ITE hearing aids with 2.5mm vent, controls deactivated, and retention tether.
